239:1: satyaparibhāvitāṃ vācamagnirapi na prasahate laṅghayitumiti satyavacane'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ|
239:4: sa katipayarātrodbhinnāṇḍakośaḥ pravirokṣyamāṇataruṇapakṣaḥ paridurbalatvādalakṣyamāṇāṅgapratyaṅgapradeśaḥ svamātāpitṛprayatnaracite tṛṇagahanopagūḍhe gulmalatāsaṃniśrite nīḍe saṃbahulairbhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ prativasati sma|
239:7: tasya tayā rūkṣālpāhāratayā na kāyaḥ puṣṭimupayayau|
239:9: itare tu vartakāpotakā yathopanītamāhāramabhyavaharanto balavantaḥ sañjātapakṣāśca babhūvuḥ|
239:19: ] teṣāmevamavasthānāṃ nātidūre mahānvanadāvaḥ pratibhayaprasaktaninado vijṛmbhamāṇadhūmarāśirvikīryamāṇajvālāvalīlolavisphuliṅgaḥ santrāsano vanacarāṇāmanayo vanagahanānāṃ prādurabhavat|
239:25: dhūmaughamagnaṃ paṭuvahniśabdaṃ vanaṃ tadārtyeva bhṛśaṃ rarāsa||6||
239:26: krameṇa cotpīḍyamāna iva sa vahniḥ paṭunā mārutena tṛṇagahanānusārī teṣāṃ nīḍasamīpamupajagāma|
239:27: atha te vartakāpotakā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣāḥ sahasā samutpetuḥ|
239:29: viditātmaprabhāvastvasaṃbhrānta eva sa mahāsattvaḥ sarabhasamivopasarpantamagniṃ sānunayamityuvāca-
239:36: nadīmiva prāpya vivṛddhatoyāṃ tadvācamāsādya śaśāma sadyaḥ||8||
239:46: tadevaṃ satyavacanaparibhāvitāṃ vācamagnirapi na prasahate laṅghayitumiti satyavacane'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ|
